name: Nano Fight
description:
Nano Fight is an exciting Strategy game, inspired by Advance Wars and limited to a 64*64 pixel screen. Your biggest enemy (an AI) is very powerful and will make it as heavy as possible for you to win. Of course. That's why he is even here.

I made the game for the #LOWREZJAM 2016, but I want to update the game in future, because the game could be much bigger. Yes, I run out of time.

conditions

  • 64*64 pixel screen
  • Game is smaller than 200 KB (without music and framework)
  • made in under 48 hours

Controls

  • F1 to view controls
  • WASD to move cursor
  • Enter to select
  • Arrow keys to move camera
  • Q to quickselect next unit
  • E to show infos
  • R to show range

All Bugs and Glitches are part of the game. But, if you find one, write it in the comments. Please.
